## Description

The Green Vintage is a **Barcelona-based** full-service events agency specializing in **corporate experiences**. They design and execute **conferences, meetings, team-building, incentive programs, family days, corporate parties**, and **product launches**. Known for creative design, seamless logistics, and sustainable planning, their events align with the **UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)**.
